column1: Duration of presentation (if event breaks naturally into segments, e.g. lecture--please give timings of segments:  Start 8:10
Are there reasons that this tape needs editing for
to pictures, nasty, evil words, etc?)  If so, where:
Moves out of mic range in very beginning.  Fix at 8:47 approx.  Sorry about line noise - not from cables or mic.
Please give your reaction to the quality of this event.
especially good or relevant, or too technical, or dull

etc.): Nice, good.  Did you have any technical problems? (equipment failure, speaker walking away from microphone, etc.):  #06807, AG 600B.  Loud hum 0-6 input A with ""RF"" interference.  This has nothing to do with input signals or cable - ""RF"" probably due to improper AC grounding.  Machine still has a meter that sticks when pined.

Philip Levine""||Original source recording: reel to reel tape.","Description on Box with tape reel:   Nov. 17th, 1976, 8:00pm, #III in series, Tails out - no tone - DAS.",00:57:14,,audio/mpeg,http://hdl.handle.net/2374.UC/696699,en_US,University of Cincinnati,University of Cincinnati.
